Question: National Sleep Foundation CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
National Sleep Foundation

CES 2024 SleepTech® Award Winners

Embr Labs - Ember Wave®

- Wrist-worn device delivers soothing cool or warm waves of temperature to aid in falling asleep and prevent nighttime discomfort.

Pocket Kado

- Science-backed virtual pet game designed to help users develop sleep hygiene and maintain routines aligned with their circadian rhythm, potentially aiding in living well with insomnia.

国家睡眠基金会

2024年CES睡眠科技®大奖获奖者

Embr Labs - Ember Wave®

- 手腕佩戴装置通过释放舒缓的冷或暖气波来帮助入睡并防止夜间不适。

Pocket Kado

- 以科学为支撑的虚拟宠物游戏，旨在帮助用户养成良好的睡眠习惯，保持与昼夜节律一致的作息，可能有助于更好地应对失眠。
